ygData.subject: No luck on the gemcutter =(
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi gang Last night I finally whipped up the gemcutter witht the diamond dust that had been sitting in my bank all this time. Did the rclick thing both with a
ygData.messageBody:
Hi gang

Last night I finally whipped up the gemcutter witht the diamond dust
that had been sitting in my bank all this time.

Did the rclick thing both with a gem and with the gemcutter. No luck
on Emeryld (bah, I can't spell that word), Cat's eye agate,
malachite,
or a Peridot. Unless this only works on the super-rare gems, looks
like we're out of luck. I'll try to catch a ride to Lavastorm and
pop
into the temple of Sol Ro where you can buy them hp/ac gems (you know
the ones I'm talking about...).

Keep tinkering!
Llabak Tharr of CoR
35 Mage and master beggar, brewer and tinker(117)
T Marr
